Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Grand
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temp rerouted via Austin, Grand, Central, North Avenue then resume their normal route on Austin, due to street blockage near Austin/Grand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Grand, Central, North Avenue then resume their normal route on Austin, due to street blockage near Austin/Grand.

Allow extra travel time.
